click to select or drag and drop a JSON: click to select or drag and drop a JSON ABI file
The code hash for the on-chain deployed: The code hash for the on-chain deployed code.
Deploy this code hash as a smart contrac: Deploy this code hash as a smart contract
The compiled WASM for the contract that: The compiled WASM for the contract that you wish to deploy. Each unique code blob will be attached with a code hash that can be used to create new instances.
The code is not recognized as being in v: The code is not recognized as being in valid WASM format
Unable to find on-chain WASM code for th: Unable to find on-chain WASM code for the supplied codeHash
The codeHash is not a valid hex hash: The codeHash is not a valid hex hash
The address for the deployed contract in: The address for the deployed contract instance.
Specify the user account to use for this: Specify the user account to use for this contract call. And fees will be deducted from this account.
A deployed contract that has either been: A deployed contract that has either been deployed or attached. The address and ABI are used to construct the parameters.
The message to send to this contract. Pa: The message to send to this contract. Parameters are adjusted based on the ABI provided.
The allotted value for this contract, i.e. the amount transferred to the contract as part of this call.
The maximum amount of gas that can be us: The maximum amount of gas that can be used by this deployment, if the code requires more, the deployment will fail.
Call a method on this contract: Call a method on this contract
Unable to find deployed contract code at: Unable to find deployed contract code at the specified address
The value is not in a valid address form: The value is not in a valid address format
The contract WASM previously deployed. I: The contract WASM previously deployed. Internally this is identified by the hash of the code, as either created or attached.
The deployment constructor information f: The deployment constructor information for this contract, as provided by the ABI.
The allotted endownment for this contrac: The allotted endownment for this contract, i.e. the amount transferred to the contract upon instantiation.
Specify the user account to use for this: Specify the user account to use for this deployment. And fees will be deducted from this account.
You are about to remove this code's ABI. Once completed, should you need to access it again, you will have to manually re-upload it.
This operaion does not impact the associ: This operaion does not impact the associated on-chain code or any of its contracts.
